args:
The party proceeds into the depths of Clave
Loy'elune, where they encounter Zethia and her
parasite, the Otherâ€”also known as Morsayati.
Seeking the final fragment for his complete
resurrection, the creature heads deeper into
the Binding Ruin, and the party gives chase.
The deeper we go, the heavier\nthe miasma becomes.
We've done a fair job avoidin' it so far,\nbut who knows how long that'll hold?
I fear it may soon prove impossible\nto continue on as we have been.
And yet, it seems like there aren't any\nalternate routes. Soooo...what now?
Uh, guys? ...Guys? ...HEY! LISTEN!\nWHAT'S THIS THING RIGHT HERE?!
Do you mean this beat-up old rock?\nWhy, I believe it is a beat-up old rock.
Hold, Mym. This is no mere stone.\nDo you see the writing beneath it?\nI think it is a monument of some kind.
The writing's pretty worn, but let's see\nwhat it says...
Here are the Deeds Preserved\nof the Great King Alberius.
Is this a monument to the War of Binding?\nAnd if so, does that mean these ruinsâ€”
What are you talking about, Zodiark?!
The blood of dragons within you\nresonates with the monument.
It flows to times long past...\nTo the great king himself...
Upon this ground shall you\nbe sealed away once more!
You think to trap me? What fantasy.
And sealing me away is naught\nbut a fool's delusion!
The only delusions here are your own.\nNow sleep ever more in the depths of\nthis land!
The mana infused in the monument\nreacted to your dragonblood,\ngranting you a vision of the past.
Dude, whoa. I saw it, too.
Me three. Er, so that was...?
Yes. That was His Majesty, King Alberius.
The legendary Founder King himself, eh?\nSo I guess that thing what he was\nfightin' there was the Other?
The same vile being from the legends of\nboth the Goddess and the Founder King.
Even after 300 years, he's still as\ngross and horrid as ever.
The Other...or perhaps we should\ncall him Morsayati.

Yes, that's his true name. Apparently many
believed the name to contain a fearsome
power, which is why people attempted to
forget it.
So I guess this ruin is where Alberius\nand the Other had their final battle?
Well, hell. If that's true, it means the\nmiasma comin' from this placeâ€”
...Comes from the portion of my being\nthat sleeps here as we speak, yes.\nSleeps, yet yearns for awakening.
How clever of you to make your way\nhere ahead of me, my dear brother.
Ah, how rare it is to hear that name\nuttered by mortal lips.
We've not come face-to-face like this\nsince I first claimed your sister's body\nfor my own.
How odd that we meet once again\nwithin a Binding Ruin.
Can't believe Zethia's possessed\nby some legendary monster.
Feels like I walked right into\na damn faerie tale.
But the Other is said to have been sealed\naway by His Majesty King Alberius.\nHow could he be here now?
Heh heh heh... Such miserable ignorance.
Enough! We'll deal with the details later!\nRight now, I'm getting Zethia back.
Ahhhh, but I fear that is impossible.\nShe is a most precious gift, you see.
Indeed. A precious one, bequeathed unto\nme from a time and place long in the past.
Aaaah ha ha! Do not fret, dear brother!
You will soon see your dear sister become\na great emperor with your own eyesâ€”once\nI regain all that I am!
As you wish, Highness. Oh, and I have\ndispatched writs of invitation to the\nother siblings as well.
Sit tight, my foolish friends! Sit tight and\nwatch as Empress Zethia gains the power\nto rule the entire world! Ha ha ha ha!
Dammit! The miasma's thicker than before!
No! Not when we are so close!
Oh, but this is TERRIFICALLY annoying!
Zodiark! This kind of thing seems right\nup your creepy alley. Is there nothing\nyou can do to help us right now?
What, ya think he's been holdin' out\non us or somethin'?
Good thing I thought to ask!
I was once enslaved by that foul being.\nAnd to some limited extent, I acquired\nthe power to resist him.
I will attempt to banish the miasma.
Now we can chase those punks down!
Come on, everyone! We're going to\ngo in there and save Zethia!
